m_szDocSumamry: America and Germany Getting Their Clean Energy Just Desserts December 2nd, 2011 by John Farrell   Germany is the unquestioned world leader in renewable energy.  By mid-2011, the European nation generated over 20 percent of its electricity from wind and solar power alone, and had created over 400,000 jobs in the industry. The sweet German success is no accident, however, and the following pie chart illustrates the results of a carefully crafted recipe for renewable energy.
